channel.title: Houston, we have a problem
channel.description:
Needed to brush up on some photoshop skills. It is obviously not brilliant, but can I have some advice on how to improve and perhaps some techniques which can improve my work.
It is rather large so I will not embed. http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/huston.jpg (my webhost is fucked up...)
Biggest problem is the shadows in the background.

item.title: Houston, we have a problem
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Looks like FSX + Links 2003 + Mars

Read full topic

item.title: Houston, we have a problem
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Try using different lighting technique with it though. Try to get everything balanced and then add some gradient maps, Hue/Sat, Brightness/Contrast and/or the lighting effects filter. I wouldn’t suggest using lens flare though.

Read full topic

item.title: Houston, we have a problem
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

the bank:

But besides all that, that girl is smokin.

Its Megan Fox

I will re-upload an “improved” version, because as browser jr said I fucked up the lighting. I tried to get the impression that the source of light is coming from the right however it is a bit too strong on Miss Fox.

item.title: Houston, we have a problem
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Nothing seems to fit with eachother.
The stick the mopar flag is on looks fake.
The flag its self have some strange edges.
The skies is ugly and don’t fit.
The mountains is to blurry on the top.
The islands on the water looks like there should not be there.
The astronaut is too unclear and the left edges to blurry.
The “grass” near the water looks to crisp and misplaced.
The green grass looks nice :D.

And the colors on the girl looks to bright.

Read full topic
